page.title: 01THORNBURY
page.content: This part of Thornbury has seen a lot of changes taking place in the last twenty years.The changes relate to the on-going need for more development in response to the growth of Bristol, hence the large modern housing estates like Chiltern Park.As the population has grown so to has the need for jobs. This demand has been met by the growth of the Industrial Estate. In contrast to this there are areas that have not been affected by these changes for example,Milbury Heath.This is probably due to other geographical factors such as the quarry at Tytherington.
